name: Mongrel
blurb: Enter the arena in a distant future and fight for your life. Survive the perils of blood sport and earn your freedom.

__________MONGREL__________

You believe in us as much as we do! For that you get everything from the DIGITAL, FANKIT, and CLOTHING tiers and  may choose one of the PRINT tiers. The same goes for ALL games we ever produce. You'll receive access to all betas and final releases and be rewarded with all the physical product we ever make.

___________ADDONS____________
All ADDONS available from each applicable tier.

___________INCLUDES___________
Includes all DIGITAL, FANKIT, and CLOTHING rewards and a single PRINT reward.
